subject: Ezlynx application data
body:
Hi Kay,


I’ve completed the initial data collection for a new applicant, *GreenLeaf
Distributors LLC.*, and wanted to share the full details below.


*Business Overview*

   - *Name:* GreenLeaf Distributors LLC
   - *Email:* contact@greenleafdist.com
   - *Website:* www.greenleafdist.com
   - *State of Registration:* California
   - *GL Code:* 78452
   - *Business Started:* June 1, 2015


*Company Profile*

   - *Ownership Structure:* Corporation
   - *Operations:* Wholesale and Manufacturing of organic food products
   - *Regulatory Compliance:* Confirmed as compliant with all applicable
   regulations
   - *Accepted Payment Methods:*
      - Cash
      - Credit/Debit Cards
      - Checks
      - Bank Transfers


*Industry Classification*

   - *NAICS Code:*  Dairy cattle and milk production


*Primary Office Address*

   - *Address Type:* Office
   - *Street Address:* 1234 Elm Street, Suite 500
   - *City:* San Diego
   - *State:* California
   - *ZIP:* 92101-0452
   - *Country:* United States
   - *Time at Address:* 3 years, 6 months




Let me know if you'd like me to begin entering this into the CRM or if
there’s anything else you need.

Best regards,
*Michael Thompson*
Sales Coordinator
michael.thompson@crmconnect.com
(555) 987-6543
